title: CAN I GET BANNED IF I USE SKIN FOR MAP(OLD RIFT)

replies.body: We don't support third party mods, and we might not ban for it now but that can change.  You are also responsible for any malicious contents hiding in whatever you download and use, or issues you come across.  Check out our[ third party guide,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) and stay safe.
pretty sure client side cosmetics are fine
